hints.content:
A palm tree had $\goldE{92}$ coconuts.

![A number line is labeled 92 on the right end and extends to the left.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/707d61890a1fa603d703ebef7d1cc3adc6b3e0ec)

To subtract on the number line, we jump to the **left**.

$\maroonD{45}$ of the coconuts were lost during a storm.

![From the right at 92 with minus 45 goes to 47. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d17f50199d8b822765860cddae19bf09dee8e8e1)

$\goldE{92} - \maroonD{45} = 47$

$\purpleD{12}$ coconuts were eaten by animals.

![From the right at 92 with minus 45 goes to 47. From 47 minus 12 goes to 35. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/54b22e30e49d07ce1fe767dbe27243e4d78a7355)

$47 - \purpleD{12} =35$

$\blueE{14}$ coconuts fell off the tree.

![A number line starts at 21 on the left and goes to 92 on the right. From the right at 92 with minus 45 goes to 47. From 47 minus 12 goes to 35. From 35 minus 14 goes to 21.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bd7818418d5aefe5c05cd986ff47d5ae3ad14ea9)

$35 - \blueE{14} = 21$

Here is the correct number line:

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 92 on the right. From the right at 92 with minus 45 goes to 47. From 47 minus 12 goes to 35. From 35 minus 14 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/49b254b43d069a505da2dd89e3379575c7f22a40)

There are ${21}$ coconuts on the palm tree.

question.content:
A palm tree had $92$ coconuts.  

Then, the palm tree lost $45$ coconuts in a storm, and $12$ coconuts were eaten by wild animals. $14$ coconuts fell off the tree.      

**Which number line shows how to find how many coconuts are left on the palm tree?**

[[☃ radio 1]]  

**How many coconuts does the palm tree have left?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] coconuts

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 29 on the left and goes to ? on the right. From the left at 29 with plus 45 goes to 74. From 74 plus 12 goes to 86. From 86 plus 14 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9e231a6886353deefe17d7fe53547340b2f464dc)

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 92 on the right. From the right at 92 with minus 45 goes to 47. From 47 minus 12 goes to 35. From 35 minus 14 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/49b254b43d069a505da2dd89e3379575c7f22a40)
